Anurag Tiwari (born 15 November 1995) is an Indian cricketer who plays for Bengal. He made his first-class debut on 23 November 2015 in the 2015–16 Ranji Trophy. He made his Twenty20 debut on 4 January 2016 in the 2015–16 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. His last T20 match was in Ranchi on 12 January 2016, it was between Jharkhand and Bengal.
